abstract: Residents of Alabama have been crossing into Georgia to buy Powerball lottery tickets, standing in lines 60 or more people deep in hopes of buying winning ticket for record jackpot, now exceeding $1.5 billion; Alabama is one of six states that do not participate in Powerball game.

headline.print_headline: Alabamians Cross State Lines, Seeking a Golden Ticket
headline.main: Alabamians Cross State Lines, Seeking a Golden Ticket

snippet: With more than a billion dollars up for grabs in the Powerball jackpot this week, people flocked to Georgia, a state that actually participates in the lottery.
lead_paragraph: With more than a billion dollars up for grabs in the Powerball jackpot this week, people flocked to Georgia, a state that actually participates in the lottery.
